nodes.text: Ossiathora was an agriworld located in the Ossiathora system of the Juvex sector, a part of the Senex-Juvex region in the Western Reaches portion of the Mid Rim. The Senex-Juvex Loop hyperlane linked it to the Deminol and Kassido systems. Ossiathora was the origin point of Ossiathoran noodles and was controlled by House Kassido, a noble house based on the world of Kassido.
Ossiathora was mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square L-17.
